name: Space Xoid - Survival
description:
Space Xoid - Survival is Similar to the classic "Asteroids" but only jam packed with much more such as:

  • Upgrades
  • Diverse future weaponry 
  •  Challenging enemies
  • Customizable settings for slow PC's

Controls

  • Steer [Left + Right]
  • Power Steer [Hold Spacebar] (Use gaming keyboard to avoid sticky controls)
  • Shoot Primary [Z]
  • Shoot Secondary [X]
  • Shoot Special [C]
  • MiniMap [M]
  • Change View [F4]

This version of the game is free and currently development is on hold due to lack of interest in the game.
